mapper.insert: insert into GGCODE (CODETYPE, COMPANYCODE, CODECODE, CODECNAME, CODETNAME, CODEENAME, CREATORCODE, CREATETIME, UPDATERCODE, UPDATETIME, VALIDDATE, INVALIDDATE, VALIDIND, REMARK, FLAG, DISPLAYNO) values (#{codetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codecname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{invaliddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayno,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update GGCODE set CODECNAME = #{codecname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODETNAME = #{codetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODEENAME = #{codeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATORCODE = #{creatorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATERCODE = #{updatercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALIDDATE = #{validdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INVALIDDATE = #{invaliddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALIDIND = #{validind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAYNO = #{displayno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where CODETYPE = #{codetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COMPANYCODE = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CODECODE = #{codecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CODETYPE, COMPANYCODE, CODECODE, CODECNAME, CODETNAME, CODEENAME, CREATORCODE, CREATETIME, UPDATERCODE, UPDATETIME, VALIDDATE, INVALIDDATE, VALIDIND, REMARK, FLAG, DISPLAYNO from GGCODE
